Entries.fall_Tue6: ...You know... as much as I hated him, I kind of miss Demetrius and his weird bossy attitude.$s
Entries.winter_Sun: A while back, I built a snowgoon, but Demetrius made me get rid of it.#$e#I was really mad at the time. He always said he wanted to connect with me, and then he went and did stuff like that.$a
Entries.winter_Sun6: A while back, I built a snowgoon, but Demetrius made me get rid of it... but he let Maru's cute little snowman go unharmed...$a#$e#He always did pick favorites.$a

Entries.winter_Tue6: When Mom threw away my old comic collection a while back, I wanted to scream at her... but something stopped me.#$e#I'm... glad I didn't yell at her.$s

Entries.summer_4.000: Dammit... I almost forgot. I have to go to the clinic today.#$b#Well... at least it'll be Maru instead of that old guy.
Dammit... I almost forgot. I have to go to the clinic today.

Entries.Fri.000: Should I go easy on this game? ...nah.$h
Entries.marriage_Fri.001: My skills haven't declined... I'm still the best around.$h
Entries.marriage_Fri.000: I'm going out to have some fun. I'll be home later.

Entries.marriage_Mon.001: For some reason, when I walked in here, I got a smile on my face right away.$7

Entries.spring_12: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival?
Entries.fall_15: The Stardew Valley Fair is a little crowded for my tastes... but I'll just hang out by myself. It'll be good to enjoy the atmosphere with some quiet time.#$e#You should play some carnival games, though! Don't worry about me.$7
